title: Condition
description: A conditional statement between either 2 signals or 1 signal and 1 constant value.

first_signal.title: First Signal
first_signal.description: The leftmost signal in the condition.

constant.title: Constant
constant.description: A constant to compare against, always lying in the rightmost slot. This value is ignored if 'second_signal' is also present.

second_signal.title: Second Signal
second_signal.description: The rightmost signal of the condition. Takes precedence over 'constant', if both happen to be specified.
